survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Autonomous Vehicle Rides
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and experience with autonomous vehicle rides, focusing on safety, comfort, and overall service quality.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your most recent autonomous vehicle ride?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly layout.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your most recent autonomous vehicle ride?

questions.question_text: What aspects of the autonomous vehicle ride did you find most satisfying? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Randomize option order to avoid bias.

script.question_text: What aspects of the autonomous vehicle ride did you find most satisfying? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use autonomous vehicle rides again in the future?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. Include a 'Prefer not to answer' option if needed.

script.question_text: How likely are you to use autonomous vehicle rides again in the future?

questions.question_text: Please describe any concerns or suggestions you have regarding autonomous vehicle rides.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length if necessary.

script.question_text: Please describe any concerns or suggestions you have regarding autonomous vehicle rides.

questions.question_text: Did you encounter any technical issues during your autonomous vehicle ride?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question with an 'unsure' option to capture uncertainty.

script.question_text: Did you encounter any technical issues during your autonomous vehicle ride?

questions.question_text: What improvements would make you more likely to use autonomous vehicle rides frequently?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended to gather detailed suggestions. Encourage honest feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would make you more likely to use autonomous vehicle rides frequently?
